name: Bike Drift Racer - Quad Stunts
description:
Bike Drift Racer - Quad Stunts Game is the most thrilling winter snow storm moto game ever produced! Become the best bike rider by riding your trail bike in heavy snowfall with almost zero visibility in this sensational of moto avalanche racing games.
Features:
Multiple levels for the lovers of offroad snow driving motorcycle simulator games.
Awesome 3D environment specially designed
Multiple types of trailbikes
Impressive and intuitive on screen controls.
Playable on multiple devices.
